name: aeonbot
description:
(There is no start screen and the game has a timer, so reload if you want to start playing. :) If the game does not react to your input, try to reload or use our self-hosted version.)

Story. BotCorp. closed permanently, but one switch was forgotten and the bot-maker is still running in low-power mode, producing a bot every now and then. Help the bots escape their factory before the bot-maker is overgrown.

Gameplay. Jump'n'jetpack'n'run with ten levels.

Controls. ASWD or arrow keys. If the jetpack is equipped, hold down the jump key (W, Up-Arrow) while being in the air.

Game jams. Entry to #lowrezjam and a #1GAM (topic: age).

Check out watermillgames.com for more games from us.
